revised_title: Magnetic Lineations in Marginal Basins of the Western Pacific
tldr: This article examines the magnetic lineation patterns in marginal basins of the western Pacific, specifically in probable and possible back-arc basins. The study compares crustal accretion processes in back-arc environments and at mid-ocean ridges, discusses mechanisms for back-arc basin generation, and reviews the knowledge of magnetic lineation patterns observed in these basins.
